Monthly News Roundup
Vol 157, September 2017

Featured News

Lilly's new targeted breast cancer agent, Verzenio, clears the FDA this month, as does GSK's Trelegy Ellipta, a triple drug, once daily inhaler for COPD. Solosec, a single-dose oral treatment for bacterial vaginosis expands new antibiotic options, and Bayer's Aliqopa for relapsed follicular lymphoma joins the booming oncology market. Plus, Amgen's Mvasi is the seventh approved U.S. biosimilar and the first for any cancer indication.

Read More

The following drugs have recently been approved by the FDA.

  • Verzenio (abemaciclib) Tablets

    Date of Approval: September 28, 2017
    Treatment for: Breast Cancer
    Release | Approval History

  • Ocrevus (ocrelizumab) Injection

    Date of Approval: September 18, 2017
    Treatment for: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease

    Date of Approval: September 18, 2017
    Treatment for: Nasal Polyps
    Release | Approval History

  • Adzenys ER (amphetamine) Extended-Release Liquid Suspension

    Date of Approval: September 15, 2017
    Treatment for: Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
    Release | Approval History

  • Solosec (secnidazole) Oral Granules

    Date of Approval: September 15, 2017
    Treatment for: Bacterial Vaginosis
    Release | Approval History

  • Mvasi (bevacizumab-awwb) Injection

    Date of Approval: September 14, 2017
    Treatment for: Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Glioblastoma Multiforme, Renal Cell Carcinoma, Cervical Cancer
    Release | Approval History

  • Aliqopa (copanlisib) Injection

    Date of Approval: September 14, 2017
    Treatment for: Follicular Lymphoma
    Release | Approval History

  • Mylotarg (gemtuzumab ozogamicin) Injection

First-Time Generic Approvals

First Time Generics are those drug products that have never been approved before as generic drug products and are new generic products to the marketplace.

  • Oseltamivir Phosphate for Oral Suspension

    6 mg (base)/mL
    Approved: September 14, 2017 - Nesher Pharmaceuticals (USA) LLC
    Generic for: Tamiflu for Oral Suspension

FDA MedWatch Alerts

  • Vegetable Vigra by Natures Supplement: Recall - Undeclared Drug Ingredient
  • Drug Safety Communication: Ocaliva (obeticholic acid) - Increased Risk of Serious Liver Injury
  • Recall: Rhino 7, Papa Zen, Fifty Shades, and Grande X Dietary Supplements by Gadget Island - Undeclared Drug Ingredients
  • Drug Safety Communication: Opioid Addiction Medications in Patients Taking Benzodiazepines or CNS Depressants - Careful Medication Management Can Reduce Risks
  • Recall: Activase (alteplase) 100mg by Genentech - Lack of Sterility Assurance
  • Drug Safety Communication: Kayexalate (sodium polystyrene sulfonate) - FDA Recommends Separating Dosing
  • Recall: Hydromorphone HCl Injection, USP 2 mg/mL, and Levophed (Norepinephrine Bitartrate Injection, USP) 4 mg/4 mL (1 mg/mL) Vial by Hospira: - Lack of Sterility Assurance
  • Alcohol Pads or Benzalkonium Chloride Antiseptic Towelettes by Foshan Flying Medical Products: FDA Alert - Lack of Sterility Assurance and Other Quality Issues
  • Recall: Unexpired Lots of Oxytocin Compounded with Either Lactated Ringers or Lactated Ringers and Dextrose by PharMEDium - Sub-Potency
